definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
false report/forgery/fabricated declaration (e.g. income tax return)

pinyin: da4 hui4 bao4 gao4 qi3 cao3 ren2

definition: Cox Report/Report of the Select Committee on US National Security and Military-Commercial Concerns with the PRC (1999); Committee Chairman Republican Rep. Chris Cox

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由罗家文进行实验探究并将成果汇总并制成研究报告。

sentences.english: No cases have been reported outside Uige for the past five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在过去5周内在威热省之外未报告发生病例。

sentences.english: The report cited several societal and economic reasons for the jump.
sentences.chinese: 该报告引用了一些社会和经济原因解释这一跨越。

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 验尸报告称，这位四岁小孩的父亲被枪击中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: China has reported 1, 537 cases of swine flu with no fatalities to date.
sentences.chinese: 中国迄今共报告了1537例甲流，没有死亡病例。

sentences.english: Vietnam also has reported recent cases of blue ear decease ( disease ).
sentences.chinese: 越南也报告说最近发现蓝耳猪的病例。

sentences.english: State-of-the-art systems report producing biogas that is more than 95% pure methane.
sentences.chinese: 最新系统报告产生的沼气中甲烷的含量超过95%。

sentences.english: Secure inflation cord on board and report.
Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本报告中亦包括与兰屿学童调查结果之比较。

sentences.english: This report characterizes the cutaneous fungal infection associated with WNS.
sentences.chinese: 本报告的特点皮肤真菌感染与WNS系列。

sentences.english: 73 countries reported collecting fewer than 10 donations per 1000 population.
sentences.chinese: 据73个国家报告，每千人献血不到10次。

sentences.english: Ukraine Gas Markets Investment Opportunities, Market Analysi…
sentences.chinese: 年乌克兰天然气市场分析预测研究报告。

sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，报告同时发现，美国边界亦岌岌可危。

sentences.english: Moreover, there are no page-outs getting reported.
sentences.chinese: 另外，没有报告页面换出。

sentences.english: Journalists are studying the minister's speech for pointers to the contents of next month's policy statement.
sentences.chinese: 记者们在研究部长讲话以揣摩下月施政报告中的动向。

sentences.english: They reported this direction to the direction - finding evaluation subsection .
sentences.chinese: 他们把这个方向报告给测向分析小组。

definition: to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
white paper (e.g. containing proposals for new legislation)/white book
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
